laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal expression of MLH1, MSH2, and MSH6; complete absence of PMS2 in both the tumor and normal tissue.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Multiplex ligation-dependent probe amplification assay of PMS2

laboratory_examinations.findings: More than 30 polyps with 1 large polyp suggestive of cancer; analysis revealed intramucosal adenocarcinoma with no submucosal invasion or nodal metastases.
Absence of PMS2 staining in both the adenocarcinoma and normal colonic epithelium.
